title: @Riot @KateyKhaos @SkinTeam
body:
I hate you all, why you do this to me... The new skins are too awesome already.

You deliver us 4 star guardians skins at once when Lux was already awesome, you give the splash arts before they are even out on the PBE (Even after PBE cycle start tomorrow, we usually wait for that) and my wallet start to cry already in a corner because I just spent a ton and I need to spend alot again.

Great fucking Job... It's already awesome skins and I didn't even see them on the PBE

Thanks from me, a Madoca Magica Fan

But no Thanks from my wallet crying out loud YAMETE YAMETE already since you revealed the skins

replies.body:
Ahhh, we're so glad that you like the skins! We've been busy at work with these skins for the last few months, and we're completely taken back by the overwhelmingly positive response! ^-^ I'll be sure to pass along the kind words to the team! 

Lemme know whatcha think when you get to play/see these ladies in action - would love to hear more of your feedback!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ujlAxVAA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-20T00:21:01.033+0000)
>
> Ahhh, we're so glad that you like the skins! We've been busy at work with these skins for the last few months, and we're completely taken back by the overwhelmingly positive response! ^-^ I'll be sure to pass along the kind words to the team! 
> 
> Lemme know whatcha think when you get to play/see these ladies in action - would love to hear more of your feedback!

I have a PBE account so it should be there by the time the PBE is patched (Gotta give a pass on Ivern too) and I will give the feedback on the PBE thread you usually make for those !

Even if you obviously can't tell about it I will still give feedback for something I'm noticing : it's also very cool to see the 4th tease about a Void invasion through skins this time (Aurelion Sol, Taric, Ryze, now Star guardians skins for teases)

General question : Is Adding lore to skins (Be it for the skins themselves or official lore like Human Ryze) becoming a trend for the future or it's still situationnal ?

Awesome work again on the skins, I usually try to contain myself for skin releases ($$$), but this time it was just too awesome  and I couldn't contain myself. I hope Star guardians trend (good or evil) will continue as it is probably those kind of positive reactions like this that made it so Lux is not alone anymore ^.^

> General question : Is Adding lore to skins (Be it for the skins themselves or official lore like Human Ryze) becoming a trend for the future or it's still situational ?

It's certainly on a case by case basis still. 

For stuff like Pool Party, it's just like, 'oh cool, these champions are headed the pool/beach', and there isn't a ton of backstory warranted (despite it being a large skin line!) It's more fun and light-hearted, and is really just champions in beach attire! 

For other skins, we can create a stronger thematic with some story telling! More current skins have veered away from 'official lore' because skins are meant to portray an alternate fantasy, and something like an Arclight Morgana likely wouldn't fit in with her fallen angel lore. ^-^

oh cool ! Thanks for the attention and answering my stuff :p

PS : Didn't give feedback on Star Guardians because Poppy not having enough blue VFX was my only ''complaint'' and it got fixed fast ! Buying them all as soon as I can :3

Yeah, of course! 

Heck yeah, we had a bunch of feedback about the lack of blue, and we worked with gameplay to sneak some in without having it affect any gameplay. :)
Would it be possible to make Poppy's abilities have a blue tint instead of yellow? Also I think  her hammer shock should look a bit brighter to fit the star guardian theme.

I have a question thats a bit ontopic and bit offtopic,
Why wasn't Syndra given one? did you want to do a team thing and push lux into the midlane spot? Sorry im a bit salty right now because i was really looking forward to a star guardian Syndra skin. =\

We do try to create team comps in skin lines when possible, and wouldn't want to make 4 top laners in one go. Lux is a versatile champion, and as you've alluded to, can go mid or support, but in the case of rounding out a team comp, she's a mid laner.  That, of course, doesn't mean that another mid laner couldn't be added in the future. For example, the Pool Party line has Renekton and Fiora; both avid top laners. Pool Party Graves and Pool Party Miss Fortune, both ADCs, and they both share in the same thematic. We aren't opposed to adding to any particular line.

Part of what defines Star Guardian are young, powerful champions with diverse personalities, so we wanted to pick champions who didn't just fall into the same personality bucket. Development time only allows for so many skins each time we do a thematic, so we pick the top (in this case 4) strongest ideas we had. This isn't just based on x champion as a Star Guardian, but the hooks and pitches we had for how the kits, sounds, etc. would look and feel; the whole package. 

Just because a particular champion wasn't selected this time, that doesn't mean they couldn't be if/when the thematic is revisited.

Does this mean we could potentially get Syndra as a dark star midlaner for that setup, i think you could even do a backstory where she used to be a star guardian and was corrupted or something like its alluded to in Janna's bio.  Im just worried that if she gets a dark star skin it'd look too similar to her base skin.

I do agree that it would look similar to her base, but we could pull a bit more orange into it, kind of like what Dark Star Varus had. To be honest, I don't think that particular line is the right fit for her. I think there may be better thematics that she'd be more suited for, and something that breaks her a bit further from her base.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ujlAxVAA,comment-id=00000005000200030000,timestamp=2016-10-05T17:33:18.378+0000)
>
> I do agree that it would look similar to her base, but we could pull a bit more orange into it, kind of like what Dark Star Varus had. To be honest, I don't think that particular line is the right fit for her. I think there may be better thematics that she'd be more suited for, and something that breaks her a bit further from her base.

What about Dark Star Xerath?

PLOX
That's a bit more likely, and honestly, I think it's a pretty badass idea.

In all honesty, is Star Guardian Urgot still off the table? Yes, it wouldn't fit. Yes, he's slated for a VGU. Yes, his personality is out of whack.
And yet, it would be the most awesome thing. I'm just curious to know if you've ever considered it, that's all.
Oh, we've definitely talked about it! Unfortunately yeah, he's off the table until his update is done.
Alternatively, they could do a schoolgirl Urgot instead.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ujlAxVAA,comment-id=0000000500020003000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-05T17:55:12.748+0000)
>
> That's a bit more likely, and honestly, I think it's a pretty badass idea.

Aawww thank you. <3 

That is more than a bit more likely though. It is divine. Just imagine.

Wet panths would be everywhere if it was done right.

I dont think it is either, i'd rather wait for something amazing then get a lackluster skin anyways.   Unless its a skin where shes on a dodgeball team. I mean come on. add in the sound effects of a Rubber ball bouncing when she ultis people. best skin ever.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ujlAxVAA,comment-id=000000050002,timestamp=2016-10-04T17:29:12.760+0000)
>
> We do try to create team comps in skin lines when possible, and wouldn't want to make 4 top laners in one go. Lux is a versatile champion, and as you've alluded to, can go mid or support, but in the case of rounding out a team comp, she's a mid laner.  That, of course, doesn't mean that another mid laner couldn't be added in the future. For example, the Pool Party line has Renekton and Fiora; both avid top laners. Pool Party Graves and Pool Party Miss Fortune, both ADCs, and they both share in the same thematic. We aren't opposed to adding to any particular line.
> 
> Part of what defines Star Guardian are young, powerful champions with diverse personalities, so we wanted to pick champions who didn't just fall into the same personality bucket. Development time only allows for so many skins each time we do a thematic, so we pick the top (in this case 4) strongest ideas we had. This isn't just based on x champion as a Star Guardian, but the hooks and pitches we had for how the kits, sounds, etc. would look and feel; the whole package. 
> 
> Just because a particular champion wasn't selected this time, that doesn't mean they couldn't be if/when the thematic is revisited.

this is the kinds of replies that katey tags and X months from now is just "SURPRISE"

[](https://cdn.meme.am/instances/500x/72171626.jpg)
But Poppy and Lulu are not young, they are literlly hundreds of years old and Janna i dont think she really qualifies for having a diverse personality

For the next time: 
please make Star Guardian Taliyah 
please make Star Guardian Taliyah 
please make Star Guardian Taliyah <3

just saying :P


(If you also make Star Guardian Illaoi you'll have my eternal gratitude xD)

> [{quoted}](name=Elewd,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ujlAxVAA,comment-id=00000005,timestamp=2016-09-20T03:05:47.850+0000)
>
> I have a question thats a bit ontopic and bit offtopic,
> Why wasn't Syndra given one? did you want to do a team thing and push lux into the midlane spot? Sorry im a bit salty right now because i was really looking forward to a star guardian Syndra skin. =\

Syndra fits into the perfect villain Side.... But currently the villains seem to be the voidborn, so who knows. If the leak is true, jinx might be a legendary skin, so even if her current VO might feel weird for Star Guardian... a legendary skin VO would do the trick perfectly.
or she could be a corrupted star guardian by the dark star people. i just wish she had sparkly stars and whatnot, if shes darkstar it'll feel too close to her base skin imo =\

I would be shocked if this skin line didn't end up like Projects(first a stand alone- yas, then a larger selection - Lucian, Fiora, Zed, Yi, Leona, then a second wave of multiple skins - Ashe, Ekko, Kat) So Im looking forward to next years!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ujlAxVAA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-20T00:21:01.033+0000)
>
> Ahhh, we're so glad that you like the skins! We've been busy at work with these skins for the last few months, and we're completely taken back by the overwhelmingly positive response! ^-^ I'll be sure to pass along the kind words to the team! 
> 
> Lemme know whatcha think when you get to play/see these ladies in action - would love to hear more of your feedback!

I'M SO EXCITED JUST READING YOU TALK ABOUT IT I'M GONNA CRY AGAIN WHEN I ALREADY CRIED AFTER FIRST SEEING THEM {{item:3070}}{{item:3070}}{{item:3070}} I cannot wait to hear all of the other VO's and see the back animations and just ugh, thank you so much for these skins they are absolutely BEAUTIFUL.

Signed with love, a Poppy/Lulu main who's an  avid Sailor Moon/magical girl fan with the tattoos to prove it.

Hey Katey, I have one very specific bit of feedback for Star Guardian Jinx: 

I think in the splashart, her eyes appear out of character to me. Not out of character for Jinx herself, they're appropriately insane for Jinx herself, but out of character with the persona Star Guardian Jinx is supposed to have according to the teaser website. They're so on-edge and insane, whereas Star Guardian Jinx isn't actually insane, she's more on-edge and rebellious, but still determined. I think Jinx's eyes in the teaser image where all 5 are falling down to the planet work really well - they give me this mixture of hot-headedness along with determination. 

I think appropriate eyes for her splash should be a bit more "heh you're about to get blown up" along with "another one down" rather than "STARS GO BOOM EVERYWHERE" Prestigious LB's eyes are the closest I can find just by randomly searching around. Something that looks slightly on-edge while looking confident/dominant and at the same time a little playful or teasing or flirtatious.

Obviously I haven't heard her voiceover yet so you're still better equipped to judge the accuracy of my critique, but that's the character impression I got from Jinx from the stuff we've been given so far, and it does not match up.

they're great

I hope you guys do a jungler next time though we need like the full 5 man team effect!

I think the lineup is
Top - Lulu
Jg - Poppy
Mid - Lux
Adc - Jinx
Support - Janna

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ujlAxVAA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-20T00:21:01.033+0000)
>
> Ahhh, we're so glad that you like the skins! We've been busy at work with these skins for the last few months, and we're completely taken back by the overwhelmingly positive response! ^-^ I'll be sure to pass along the kind words to the team! 
> 
> Lemme know whatcha think when you get to play/see these ladies in action - would love to hear more of your feedback!

Just have to say as someone with over 1.3 million Janna points, you totally made my night! Can't wait to play using it. 

My only immediate feedback is that the hair seems a bit off in comparison to the rest of the colors (as well as maybe too much hair in the front/bangs), and the collar seems a bit high, but other than that it's gorgeous *_* The little bunny Zephyr fucking takes the cake, and the ribbons on her skirt look very ethereal.

I have to ask, why does everyone compare these to Madoka? When I see them my first thought is immediately Sailor Moon. 
Sure, Madoka is _kinda_ similar I guess, but the sailors are dead ringers.

> [{quoted}](name=CB Thea Queen,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ujlAxVAA,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-20T01:05:52.598+0000)
>
> I have to ask, why does everyone compare these to Madoka? When I see them my first thought is immediately Sailor Moon. 
> Sure, Madoka is _kinda_ similar I guess, but the sailors are dead ringers.

Lux is Madoka herself but without a Bow. Shiro the White familiar with Jinx is a nod to Kyuubey imo. 

Jinx seems to have the personnality to fit Kyoko from the same anime.

Lux got Madoka looks and cheerful personallity.

Mami and Janna wants to transfer their knowledge because they lost alot of people in their past

Poppy wants to have her duty done and protect her friend(s) no matter what, even if alone... Just like Homura

Finally Lulu is the only one I can but she's easy going as Sayaka but the story teaser in her profile seem to tell it's a mask to not fall in sadness.

Seems mostly based on personality though. From a visual standpoint their costumes are **much** closer to the sailors.
I can see that they got some inspiration from Madoka, but the immediate thought for me (and there has to be others) is Sailor Moon.
@Riot KateyKhaos thanks for the distraction from the yasuo hate threads :^)
Since the rest of the Star Guardians get that singing voice clip on their recalls, will SG Lux get that as well for consistency sake...or will they keep the old transformation music clip?
